NK041(di)005:2: gang zhig mchod rten srog shing la //
NK041(di)005:3: gzab dgos gsungs kyang dka' bar gda' //
NK041(di)005:4: yig cha rnams las ring thung ni //
NK041(di)005:5: mchod rten tshad la gzhal zhes dang //
NK041(di)005:6: sa 'dzin nyi zla'i bar du dang //
NK041(di)005:7: rmang dge'i steng nas rtse bar dang //
NK041(di)005:8: bum gdan nyi zla'i bar du dang //
NK041(di)005:9: bum dbus dkyil 'khor yan chad sogs //
NK041(di)005:10: mtha' gcig nges tig ma rnyed la //
NK041(di)005:11: mchod rten chung 'bring yin pa'i skabs //
NK041(di)005:12: chos 'khor nyi zla'i nang bar du //
NK041(di)005:13: srog shing shong thabs dka' ba'i phyir //
NK041(di)005:14: zhal rgyun du ni srog shing rtse //
NK041(di)005:16: khang brtsegs yin na khang chung nang //
NK041(di)005:17: rtse mo yong bar dgos zhes thos //
NK041(di)005:18: rang bzo'i gnas tshad lag len la //
NK041(di)005:19: mchod rten smin lugs lta bu'i skabs //
NK041(di)005:20: rmang dge'i steng nas srog shing ni //
NK041(di)005:21: ring thung cha phran so gnyis bya //
NK041(di)005:22: chos 'khor gnyis tsam bar du yong //
NK041(di)005:23: dbyibs ni gru bzhi sbom phra ni //
NK041(di)005:24: rtsa ba'i ngos la cha phran gnyis //
NK041(di)005:25: rtse mo cha phran gcig tsam bya //
NK041(di)005:26: mchod rten che na rtsa bar gcig /
NK041(di)005:27: rtse la phyed tsam gang 'tsham bya //
NK041(di)005:28: mas rim cha phran dang po ni //
NK041(di)005:29: 'phang lo rang dod byas na bde //
NK041(di)005:30: gnyis dang gsum la rdo rje brko //
NK041(di)005:31: bzhi par su pra tish+tha bri //
NK041(di)005:32: brgyad par h+aa dang bcu gnyis s+w+aa //
NK041(di)005:33: bcu bdun pa la +aa yu she //
NK041(di)005:34: bco brgyad h'u la nyer bzhir +aah nyer brgyad pa la yig dang //
NK041(di)005:37: so gcig so gnyis mchod rten brko //
NK041(di)005:38: de yi seng khrir yig bri //
NK041(di)005:39: thig tshad gzhan la dbri snon mdzod //
NK041(di)005:40: 'dir ni h+aa yig cung dma' yang //
NK041(di)005:41: sku tshad gzhal na gsang bar 'phrod //
NK041(di)005:42: smin lo gnas yig phyogs bzhi gar //
NK041(di)005:43: tshig zur yod kyang mkhyen kong med //
NK041(di)005:45: gsungs na bid+y+aa su pra yang //
NK041(di)005:46: ngos bzhir bri na mi 'gal te //
NK041(di)005:48: ngos gsum 'ja' gur nya mgo'i nang //
NK041(di)005:49: sum 'bid bri na yangs dogs snyoms //
